login.noClass: The code entered does not correspond to any classroom.
login.countdown1: The Classroom management module is currently in its beta stage. If you wish to try it out, please contact the Vittascience team.
login.title: Manage your Classrooms</br>with Vittascience
login.subtitle: Discover - Learn - Share
login.gar: Enjoy the Classroom module with ease using GAR.
login.firstVisit: First time? Please choose a username.

error.used: This username is already in use, please choose another
error.badInput: Your username or password is wrong.

suscribe.title: subscribe
suscribe.content: The Classroom management module is available for free as a trial version. Benefit from all the features with the Vittascience Premium subscription. Find all the advantages and details of the Vittascience Premium offer using the button below.

activities.title: Easily create your activities
activities.content: The activity editor makes it easy to create instructional content by including text, images, videos, Vittascience APIs, Genially presentations, and more.</br></br>Browse the Vittascience collaborative resource bank, which includes several hundred free and reusable activities. If the author of a resource allows it, you can even make changes to adapt the content to your students.

attribute.title: Assign them to your students
attribute.content: Once your activities have been created, you can assign them to your students. They can be assigned individually or to entire groups, such as a class or science club.</br></br>Students can securely log in using a Classroom code, link, QR code, or GAR, and complete their assigned activities.

visualize.title: Visualize their results
visualize.content: The dashboard allows you to track students' progress as they move through the activities and courses. Find your students' work in one click and leave comments.</br></br>Thanks to the automatic validation/correction system for blocks and Python, the dashboard fills up automatically with your students' results. Rapidly identify struggling students, gaining valuable time to accompany them.

register.title: Register
register.description: Please complete the following fields to create your account.

The Vittascience team thanks you for your trust and wishes you a good day.

1.title: What is the Classroom module?
1.answer: The Classroom module facilitates the allocation of educational content and the monitoring of learners. Teachers can use community contents, or create their own activities and share them.

2.title: Who uses the Classroom module?
2.answer: In class as at home or in an extracurricular workshop, the classroom module is used by teachers (teachers, facilitators, trainers, etc.) and their learners (pupils, students, apprentices, etc.). The Class module has been designed for secondary level (~ 10 to 18 years old), but can be adapted to other contexts.

3.title: What is the nature of the support from the Ministry of National Education?
3.answer: Vittascience is the winner of the Édu-up program to support the production of innovative digital resources. More details are available on the page dedicated to Edu-up .

4.title: On which media can the Class module be used?
4.answer: The classroom module works on computers, tablets and smartphones with most browsers and an internet connection.

5.title: Can we request a demonstration?
5.answer: We regularly organize Class module presentation webinars, you can subscribe to the Vittascience Youtube channel to view the replay and see the next scheduled webinars. To book a video conference demonstration with one of our pedagogical representatives, contact us using this form .

6.title: How do I report bugs and provide feedback on the Classroom module?
6.answer: You can contact us on the Classroom module in the profile tab with the "Help " button.

7.title: Is the Class module available in multiple languages?
7.answer: Yes, the Classroom module is currently available in French and English. To change the language, go to the profile tab, click on the Settings button, then select the language that suits you.

1.title: Can we give a description or presentation of the Class module?
1.answer: Yes, you can reuse the visuals for Classroom module to create a description, presentation, training, tutorial, course or other. If you wish to include images or activity content, please mention the author (see next question).

2.title: Can we reuse the activities of the Vittascience community?
2.answer:
Yes, all activities visible in the Vittascience resource bank are under a Creative Commons license. Two cases are possible:
  • CC BY-NC-SA: the author wants the content to be shared for non-commercial use only and on condition of mentioning his name. The content is subject to change.
  • CC BY-NC-ND: The author wants the content to be shared for non-commercial use only and on condition of mentioning his name. The content cannot be changed.

3.title: Where can I find the source code for the Classroom module?
3.answer: The source code of the Classroom module is currently available on the Vittascience Github repository. Feel free to contribute!

1.title: How to connect to the Classroom module?
1.answer:
It is possible to connect to the Classroom module in three ways:
  • Classroom code: allows learners to register or connect quickly with only a pseudonym (without entering an email address). A classroom code is automatically generated for each class created by the teacher.
  • Vittascience account: allows the teacher to connect with a Vittascience account (email address and password). This method is reserved for teachers and is not suitable for learners (RGPD).
  • GAR account: the resource access manager ("GAR") aims to simplify and secure authenticated access between ENT users and their digital resources. More information is available on the page accessing Vittascience through the GAR .
Respect for privacy is essential for Vittascience, for Find out more on the page dedicated to the protection of personal data .

2.title: Can I use Vittascience without an account?
2.answer: Without an account, it is possible to use the Schedule page and access Vittascience Educational Resources. However, you will need an account to complete classroom activities, save your achievements, and share your content. Your learners do not need to create a Vittascience account if you invite them via the Classroom module.

3.title: How to create an account?
3.answer:
Just click "Subscribe" on the Classroom module home page. You will need to choose the offer that suits you and provide some information.
  • If you have opted for the free offer, an email will be sent to you to confirm your account. Just click on the link to confirm your account. Once your account is confirmed, you can explore the interface, create your activities and share them.
  • If you have opted for a paid offer, you can proceed to the creation of a quote for your establishment or upon purchase, then your account will be activated.

4.title: What is a teacher account?
4.answer: Any Vittascience account created from an email address or from the GAR can be used as a teacher account. A teacher account has features for creating learner accounts, organizing activities and exchanging comments with his learners.

5.title: What is a learner account?
5.answer: A learner account allows you to carry out activities requested by teachers, explore Vittascience programming interfaces and share your own achievements. Only a pseudonym is required for the creation of a learner account. A 4-digit code is automatically generated to secure learner access, only the teacher can modify it.

6.title: Forgot username or password?
6.answer: If you have a Vittascience (teacher) account, you can receive a password recovery email via this link. As a learner, you must ask your teacher to reset your 4-digit code.

7.title: How do I change my password or other account settings?
7.answer: To change password or other settings, go to your profile page. In the case of GAR, the settings are those of your ENT.

1.title: Can I make my own description or presentation of the Classroom module?
1.answer: Yes, you may reuse the visuals for the Classroom module to create your own description, presentation, training module, tutorial, course or other content. If you wish to include activity content or images, please mention the author (see next question).

2.title: Can I reuse the activities of the Vittascience community?
2.answer:
Yes, all activities visible in the Vittascience resource bank are under a Creative Commons license. Two cases are possible:
  • CC BY-NC-SA: the author wishes to share the content for non-commercial use only and on condition that their name is mentioned. The content may be modified.
  • CC BY-NC-ND: the author wishes to share the content for non-commercial use only and on condition that their name is mentioned. The content may not be modified.

3.title: Where can I find the Classroom module source code?
3.answer: The source code of the Classroom module is currently available on the Vittascience Github repository. Feel free to contribute!

description.reading: This activity allows you to view images, videos, PDFs, Vittascience interfaces as well as external tools.
description.free: This activity allows students to answer a written exercise.
description.quiz: This activity assesses knowledge using multiple or simple choice questions.
description.fillIn: This activity allows you to apply your knowledge by filling in empty boxes.
description.dragAndDrop: This activity allows you to drag and drop words into different empty spaces.
